body_html:
Ok, thanks for your reply.
Is it possible to support the grid_sample for the feature with batch = 1, but accompanied with batch affine parameters? I feel this will be very useful ( In my project, I use this in lots of places)

body:
Ok, thanks for your reply.
Is it possible to support the grid_sample for the feature with batch = 1, but accompanied with batch affine parameters? I feel this will be very useful ( In my project, I use this in lots of places)
